name: Okubi
storyline:
Following a thousand years of rivality, two merciless empires came upon a spiritual entity holding more power than they've ever wished for. Okubi

Spoken only in tales and legends, his sight, precursor of disastrous events.

Master of the unforgivable art of gorium energy, it is known to annihilate entire civilizations for even the smallest crystal, leaving behind corrupted creatures to guard depleted sources while it regenerates.

Avid of power, the two empires went on a quest of acquiring some for themselves.
Sending only the best warriors to complete the task, an elite force of highly trained soldiers instructed to decimate any resisting force.

Hundred years have now passed,

A new generation is born.

Children corrupted by the flow of gorium, showing extraordinary abilities and unimaginable strength.

We call them,
The Remnants
summary:
Okubi is a multi-battleground Player-versus-player game where you incarnate a corrupted creature armed to the teeth.
Absorb all sources of life, upgrade your gear and join the ranks in unique, fast-paced and explosive adventures.
Learn new abilities, gather resources to forge powerful items and collect epic rewards to enhance your character. Combine ground and aerial abilities in merciless 20-minutes battlegrounds.
